fullText:
Revelation of the Spirit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, shaman, Watcher Spirit class feature
Benefit: Enemies hit by your shaman spirit attacks cannot benefit from cover or concealment (though they still benefit from superior cover or total concealment) until the start of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 14.
